values: Holy, Holy, Holy Is the Lord of HostsHoly, Holy, Holy Is the Lord of Hosts

If we want revival to happen, we need to see God for who he is. Only when we see God as God and confess him as so, then we can have real delight.If we want revival to happen, we need to see God for who he is. Only when we see God as God and confess him as so, then we can have real delight.
